name: FriendsMeetingFriends
0:
”Alexa, open Friends Meeting Friends”
”Alexa, ask Friends Meeting Friends to Introduce me to one of your friends”
”Alexa, ask Friends Meeting Friends to let me introduce a friend”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: friends meeting friends
des:
Friends Meeting Friends showcases the 26 voices that an Amazon Alexa skill developer can now use to enhance the user's experience. Hear a random friend of Alexa greet you with a random phrase or you can introduce one of your friends to one of hers. There are over 300 combinations of greetings and voices that you can hear!

Friends Meeting Friends gives you a sample of some of the voices you may be hearing in the future. Have fun & make some new friends!
